title: It was I...
body: You have not only survived, but you have succeeded beyond my wildest expectations. I have been pushing you to succeed and recording your successes. I have been watching your progress. Watching over you. Anticipating every move. You would never have moved forward without my encouragement... but the success is yours and yours alone. You have done well. I was once like you: Tried and found wanting. That's right... The journal you found was once my own. The bones mine as well. You have done what I could not. You have saved yourself and all of mankind... but, me... you have released me from this mortal coil. I am eternally grateful.
